about_the_game:
Playtime: Approx. 1hour to 90 mins. Perfect Bedtime Horror Length.
Third Person Survival Horror Game-play interspersed with Cinematic Cutscenes with an engaging storyline.

    Experience a spine-chilling psychological horror adventure

    Unravel a gripping story with captivating cutscenes

    Choose from four vintage retro styles to customize the game's atmosphere

    Encounter survival horror elements, jump scares, and psychological twists

    Inspired by the legendary work of Akira Yamaoka and Takayoshi Sato in Silent Hill 2

    Perfect for fans of retro indie horror and those seeking a haunting and immersive gaming experience.


Get ready for a heart-pounding third person horror experience, best played at night.
In this psychological horror experience you'll join three friends who are excited to see their favourite band, only to encounter a hitchhiker on a desolate highway. As the miles pass by, the hitchhiker's unsettling presence becomes sinister, and their true identity is shrouded in darkness.

Will you be able to make it to the end of the road and survive?


The soundtrack compliments and that heightens the suspense during the unsettling gameplay sections, this game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat. So turn off the lights, put on your headphones, and prepare for a truly memorable horror adventure.

Whether you're a supporter of indie horror developers or enjoy streaming spine-chilling games online, DON'T LET HIM IN is a perfect addition to your collection. Don't miss out on this immersive horror experience that will keep you guessing until the very end.

note from the developer
Hey there! It's jonniemadeit, and I wanted to give you all a quick update on my latest project. This is actually my first paid project, and I've put a ton of love and care into it to make it the best it can be. As a solo developer, I'm aware that there may be some bugs and upcoming updates needed after this first release but I've included saved checkpoints to hopefully mitigate most issues. I just want to ask for your understanding and support as I continue to work on this project. Thanks so much for your support, and I hope you all enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!

content_descriptors.notes:
Don't Let Him In is an intense and psychologically disturbing video game experience. This game is intended for mature audiences only. Player discretion is advised.

Please be aware that Don't Let Him In explores themes of horror, suspense, and psychological terror. The game features graphic imagery, violent scenes, and unsettling content that may be disturbing or distressing to some players.

Engaging with the game's frightening atmosphere, unsettling narrative, and disturbing visual and audio elements is intended solely for entertainment purposes. The actions and events portrayed in the game are fictional and should not be replicated or imitated in real life.

If you are sensitive to horror, easily frightened, or uncomfortable with explicit depictions of terror, it is strongly advised to refrain from playing Don't Let Him In. Additionally, parental guidance is strongly recommended for younger players due to the game's mature themes and psychological intensity.

While playing Don't Let Him In, please prioritize your mental and emotional well-being. If you find yourself feeling overwhelmed, anxious, or experiencing any negative reactions, it is recommended to take breaks, seek support, or discontinue playing the game altogether.

By choosing to play Don't Let Him In, you acknowledge and understand the explicit and disturbing content it presents and take full responsibility for your decision to engage with such content.

Enter the chilling world of Don't Let Him In cautiously, respecting your own personal limits, and remember to prioritize your safety and mental health at all times.
